## TL;DR Executive Summary
This binder delivers **complete, code-ready specifications** for: multi-location (Tenant→Business Unit→Line of Business), Fleet/Assets, **Scoped Vendor Roles** (accountant, IT vendor, auditor, consultant), migration framework (CSV importers, API bridges, dual-run & rollback), **ULAP monetization** (client-pays-first, adoption discounts, rate limits), and **baseline integrations** (Paylocity, Geotab; Holman optional). Every section includes **button-by-button UX**, **API contracts with JSON examples**, **SQL DDL + migrations + rollback**, **AI flows with cost hooks**, **security controls**, **tests**, **ops runbooks**, and **acceptance criteria**.

# 01 • RBAC & Scoped Vendor Roles
### JWT Audiences
- `aud=provider` (provider portal)
- `aud=tenant` (tenant employees/managers)
- `aud=tenant_vendor` (scoped vendor roles)
### Role Matrix
- **tenant_owner** — full control of tenant, all BUs and LoBs
- **tenant_manager** — manage assigned BU/LoB, approve costed features
- **tenant_employee** — operate jobs/tasks within BU/LoB scope
- **tenant_accountant** — invoices/payments/budgets/exports only
- **tenant_it_vendor** — IT vendor scope: integrations, vendor tickets, maintenance coordination
- **tenant_auditor** — read-only finance + exports (no PII downloads unless allowed)
- **tenant_consultant** — read-only dashboards and KPIs

### Enforcement
- **Row-Level Security (RLS):** every query checks `tenant_id` AND `role_scope`.
- **Route Guards:** server checks `aud` + role; UI hides unauthorized nav.
- **Secrets:** integrations stored per-tenant and decryptable only by server with KMS; vendor roles can view **status** but not secrets.
- **Audit:** All mutations log `{tenant_id, user_id, role, action, resource, ts}`.

# 03 • Database Migrations (SQL)

```sql
-- Tenants
CREATE TABLE tenants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  plan TEXT DEFAULT 'free',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);

-- Business Units (locations)
CREATE TABLE business_units (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  timezone TEXT DEFAULT 'UTC',
  address JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_bu_tenant ON business_units(tenant_id);

-- Lines of Business (vertical packs)
CREATE TABLE lines_of_business (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  bu_id UUID REFERENCES business_units(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  key TEXT NOT NULL, -- e.g., 'cleaning','fencing','rolloff','porta_john'
  enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  config JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uniq_lob_tenant_key_bu ON lines_of_business(tenant_id, key, bu_id);
```

```sql
-- Vendor roles and users
CREATE TABLE vendor_roles (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  key TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, -- tenant_it_vendor, tenant_accountant, etc.
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  password_hash TEXT,
  role TEXT NOT NULL,           -- tenant_owner/manager/employee/... or vendor key
  role_scope TEXT DEFAULT 'employee', -- 'employee' | 'vendor'
  audience TEXT NOT NULL,       -- 'tenant' | 'tenant_vendor'
  status TEXT DEFAULT 'active',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_users_tenant ON users(tenant_id);
```

```sql
-- Fleet & Assets
CREATE TABLE fleet_vehicles (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  bu_id UUID REFERENCES business_units(id),
  asset_tag TEXT,
  vin TEXT,
  plate TEXT,
  make TEXT, model TEXT, year INT,
  dot_number TEXT,
  odometer BIGINT DEFAULT 0,
  status TEXT CHECK (status IN ('active','maintenance','retired')) DEFAULT 'active',
  metadata JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_fleet_by_tenant_bu ON fleet_vehicles(tenant_id, bu_id);

CREATE TABLE fleet_maintenance_tickets (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES fleet_vehicles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  opened_by UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  assigned_to UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  title TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  severity TEXT CHECK (severity IN ('low','medium','high','critical')),
  status TEXT CHECK (status IN ('open','in_progress','waiting_parts','done','canceled')) DEFAULT 'open',
  dvir_ref TEXT,
  opened_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  closed_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE INDEX idx_fleet_tickets_vehicle ON fleet_maintenance_tickets(vehicle_id);
```

```sql
-- Integrations: Paylocity, Geotab, Holman (optional)
CREATE TABLE integration_configs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  type TEXT NOT NULL, -- 'paylocity' | 'geotab' | 'holman'
  status TEXT CHECK (status IN ('disconnected','pending','connected','error')) DEFAULT 'disconnected',
  config JSONB DEFAULT '{}', -- encrypted at rest by app layer KMS
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE INDEX idx_integration_tenant_type ON integration_configs(tenant_id, type);

-- Geotab DVIR logs (subset)
CREATE TABLE geotab_dvir_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  device_id TEXT,
  driver_id TEXT,
  vehicle_ref UUID REFERENCES fleet_vehicles(id),
  defects JSONB,
  certified_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
  status TEXT CHECK (status IN ('new','processed','ignored')) DEFAULT 'new',
  raw JSONB
);
CREATE INDEX idx_dvir_tenant_status ON geotab_dvir_logs(tenant_id, status);

-- Holman fuel transactions (subset)
CREATE TABLE holman_fuel_transactions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  vehicle_ref UUID REFERENCES fleet_vehicles(id),
  driver_pin TEXT,
  gallons NUMERIC(12,3),
  price_per_gallon NUMERIC(12,4),
  total_cents BIGINT,
  odometer BIGINT,
  vendor TEXT,
  purchased_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
  raw JSONB
);
CREATE INDEX idx_fuel_tenant_vehicle_time ON holman_fuel_transactions(tenant_id, vehicle_ref, purchased_at);
```

```sql
-- ULAP (meters, credits, pricing, usage)
CREATE TABLE pricing_catalog (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  key TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, -- e.g., 'ai_tokens','maps_calls','email_count','integration_geotab'
  list_price_cents BIGINT NOT NULL,
  adoption_discount_eligible BOOLEAN DEFAULT false
);

CREATE TABLE tenant_entitlements (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  key TEXT NOT NULL, -- feature/limit key
  enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  quota BIGINT,
  meta JSONB DEFAULT '{}'
);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uniq_entitlement ON tenant_entitlements(tenant_id, key);

CREATE TABLE credits_ledger (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  key TEXT NOT NULL, -- meter key
  delta_cents BIGINT NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_credits_tenant_key ON credits_ledger(tenant_id, key);

CREATE TABLE usage_ledger (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  key TEXT NOT NULL, -- meter key
  quantity BIGINT NOT NULL,
  cost_cents BIGINT NOT NULL,
  context JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_usage_tenant_key_time ON usage_ledger(tenant_id, key, created_at);
```

```sql
-- Audit logs
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  user_id UUID,
  role TEXT,
  action TEXT,
  resource TEXT,
  meta JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_tenant_time ON audit_logs(tenant_id, created_at);
```
### Migration Order & Rollback
1) Create new tables; 2) backfill where needed; 3) add FKs; 4) deploy code; 5) enable features per tenant. Rollback by disabling features, draining queues, reversing backfills, and dropping tables in reverse order.

# 04 • Fleet & Assets — Button-by-Button

### Button: **Add Vehicle**
- Props/State: `tenant_id`, `bu_id`, `currentUser`, `entitlements`, `networkOnline`, `idempotencyKey`
- Events: `ui.click`, `analytics.track`, domain `fleet.clicked.add_vehicle`
- API: `POST /tenant/fleet/vehicles`
- Request:
```json
{
  "request_id": "{uuid}",
  "tenant_id": "{tenant_id}",
  "bu_id": "{bu_id}",
  "actor": {
    "user_id": "{user_id}",
    "role": "{role}"
  },
  "payload": {
    "vin": "<vin_value>",
    "plate": "<plate_value>",
    "make": "<make_value>",
    "model": "<model_value>",
    "year": "<year_value>",
    "dot_number": "<dot_number_value>",
    "asset_tag": "<asset_tag_value>"
  },
  "idempotency_key": "{uuid}"
}
```
- Response:
```json
{
  "status": "ok",
  "result": {
    "id": "<resource_id>",
    "version": 1
  },
  "audit_id": "<audit_id>",
  "cost": {
    "ai_tokens": 0,
    "cents": 0
  }
}
```
- Validation: required fields; role must be `tenant_owner|tenant_manager` for writes
- Error UX: inline errors for 400/422; toast for 403/404; **402 PAYMENT_REQUIRED** banner with “Prepay & enable” CTA when costed
- Retries/Idempotency: backoff 250/500/1000ms; `Idempotency-Key` required
- Acceptance: DB row created/updated; audit log written; UI reflects change without reload

# 06 • Migration Framework (Enterprise-Safe)

### Modes
- **CSV Importers:** orgs, contacts, assets, invoices, work orders, fuel, DVIR.
- **API Bridges:** Jobber/ProDBX/ServiceTitan when credentials provided.
- **Dual-Run Mirror:** nightly sync; users validate; then **cutover**; keep rollback snapshot 14 days.

### Buttons
- **Upload CSV** → `POST /tenant/migration/csv`  
- **Map Fields** → `POST /tenant/migration/map`  
- **Validate Sample** → `POST /tenant/migration/validate`  
- **Start Mirror** → `POST /tenant/migration/mirror/start`  
- **Cutover** → `POST /tenant/migration/cutover`  
- **Rollback** → `POST /tenant/migration/rollback`  

### Errors & Safety
- Reject on ambiguous mapping; show top-3 suggestions from AI mapper.  
- Hard stop on 10%+ record validation failures; produce error export.  
- Rollback restores snapshot and invalidates new writes since cutover.  


---

# 07 • ULAP Monetization & Rate Limits

- **Client-pays-first:** costed actions check `credits_ledger` → if insufficient, return **402 PAYMENT_REQUIRED** with `prepay_url`.
- **Adoption Discounts:** universal-license features drop price 10% per +10 active tenants (cap 70%) applied system-wide.
- **Rate Limits (auto-scale per tenant):**
  - Email drafts: base 20/min; scale to p95 usage + burst credits; BU overrides allowed.
  - API integrations: base 60/min per integration; scale by success rate and SLA.
  - AI tokens: monthly cap with 70/85/100% alerts and optional grace minutes billed after.
- **Grace Window:** optional; banner shows “In grace” with countdown; audit event logged.

# 09 • Security Controls & PenTests

- **RBAC & RLS:** enforced per route/table; vendor roles isolated via `aud=tenant_vendor` and `role_scope='vendor'`.
- **Secrets:** KMS; per-tenant encryption; never exposed to vendor users.
- **Audit:** all mutations; integration calls hashed; tamper checks nightly.
- **Exports:** watermarking; owner-only; time-limited links.
- **Pentest Scenarios:**
  - Vertical escalation attempts (vendor → employee) blocked.
  - Integration webhook spoofing → signature validation required.
  - CSV injection → sanitize headers; reject formula payloads.
  - N+1 query probes → verify indexes; p95 latency gates.
- **CI Gates:** deny merge if costed route lacks 402 path; if route lacks RBAC test; or if migration has no down script.


---

# 10 • Testing Strategy

- **Unit:** validators, mappers, ULAP calculators, rate-limit math.
- **Integration:** each API happy/sad paths; retries; idempotency replays.
- **E2E:** role-scoped journeys (owner, manager, employee, accountant, IT vendor).
- **Load:** 500 RPS across fleet & migration endpoints; SLO p95 <900ms on cache miss.
- **Fixtures:** seed tenants/BUs/LoBs; demo fleet; CSV samples; Geotab DVIR examples.
- **Coverage goal:** 85% statements; critical paths 95%+.


---

# 11 • Ops & Observability

- **Dashboards:** API latency, errors, cost per tenant, DVIR backlog, fuel anomalies.
- **Alerts:** p95 > SLA, 5xx spikes, integration failures >3 in 10m, ULAP overrun.
- **Runbooks:** Geotab outage; Paylocity auth fail; Holman feed gap; migration rollback.
- **Backups:** nightly DB; object storage for imports; 14d rollback snapshots.
- **DR:** RPO 24h, RTO 4h for starter tier.


---

# 12 • Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All fleet buttons create/update data, audit written, RLS enforced
- [ ] Vendor roles can sign in with limited nav; no access to CRM/finance
- [ ] Paylocity & Geotab connections succeed with tenant-supplied keys; Holman optional toggle
- [ ] ULAP 402 path blocks costed actions without credits; prepaid works
- [ ] Migration dual-run can cutover and rollback; error exports generated
- [ ] AI flows run on Eco tier with budgets; upgrade-to-Full flow charges correctly
- [ ] CI gates pass; load tests meet SLOs; dashboards live

**When all boxes are checked, proceed to `binder4.md` if present.**

# Button-by-Button — Per Vertical

## Cleaning

### Button: **Create Estimate**
- API: `POST /tenant/verticals/cleaning/actions/1`
- Request:
```json
{
  "request_id": "{uuid}",
  "tenant_id": "{tenant}",
  "bu_id": "{bu}",
  "actor": {
    "user_id": "{user}",
    "role": "tenant_manager"
  },
  "payload": {
    "vertical": "Cleaning",
    "action": "create_estimate",
    "context": {
      "sample": true
    }
  },
  "idempotency_key": "{uuid}"
}
```
- Response:
```json
{
  "status": "ok",
  "result": {
    "id": "CLE-001",
    "state": "queued"
  },
  "audit_id": "AUD-CLE-001"
}
```
- Validation: required fields; role=owner|manager for billable actions
- Errors: 402 on costed action without credits; 409 on idempotent replay
- Acceptance: state change recorded; audit created; UI toast confirms
